name: Dead Night (itch)
description:
This is a game i am still working on, this game will have more guns and maybe some new stuff like knifes and grenades. Keep in mind, that this is my first FPS game, the map looks pretty meh and I'll be adding more maps sooner or later (cornfield map, forest map etc).

My aim for this game was to make it look like a cheap zombie game that isn't the most realistic thing, but it's still somewhat fun and looks cheap as i said before.

Currently added guns:
M1 Carbine
Browning-HI
AK47
